name: 我的拿汀學姐
description:
This game is an adult romance, interactive romance novel game. Players play the role of the protagonist and experience the journey of love with senior sister Datin.
An original story by the new generation graphic writer and millionaire award winner Ai Jessy
The content is restricted, 18 banned works
The operation is simple, just use the mouse, and you can operate with one click.
Randomly appear in the game "click me color" button, press it and dozens of exquisite "color" illustrations will appear
Absolutely worth collecting, spend lonely nights with you, and enjoy the sweet happiness of love!
Download now, my senior Datin!
